titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rush Rhees, 20. 4. [1939]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Ã–NB (Autogr. 1286/16-1); Kopie im BA. Publiziert (WiC, S. 303).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Just come to my classes (the first one will be on Monday at 5 p.m.). If anyone says anything I'll deal with them. I'll be very glad to see you there but I know my performances will be awful. I'm upset by all sorts of things & don't yet see at all how I'll be able to concentrate my thoughts sufficiently As to say anything worth saying. I'm feeling very funky indeed.
